SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT t0.DocDate as 'Tanggal Posting', t0.DocNum as 'No.Dokumen', t0.CardCode as 'Kode Customer', t0.CardName as 'Nama Customer', t1.ItemCode as 'Kode Barang', t1.Dscription as 'Nama Barang', t1.Quantity, t1.UoMCode as 'UoM Satuan', t1.U_IDU_QtyPack as 'Qty Pack', t1.U_IDU_UoMPack as 'UoM Pack', CASE WHEN t0.DocStatus = 'O' THEN 'Open' WHEN t0.DocStatus = 'C' THEN 'Close' ELSE 'Cancelled' END 'Status'
FROM ORDR t0
INNER JOIN RDR1 t1 on t0.DocEntry = t1.DocEntry WHERE (T0.CardCode = ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' = '') :2 :3

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToDNDataTable(0,'Tanggal Posting,No.Dokumen,Kode Customer,Nama Customer,Kode Barang,Nama Barang,Quantity,UoM Satuan,Qty Pack,UoM Pack,Status','@')
DataViewToText(0,'Tanggal Posting,No Dokumen,Kode Customer,Nama Customer,Kode Barang,Nama Barang,Quantity,UoM Satuan,Qty Pack,UoM Pack,Status','@',{32768,84},';','',0)
IF(Trim({0,92})='' OR ISNULL({0,92}),'',' AND T0.CardName LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(37)&Trim({0,92})&ASCIIChr(37)&ASCIIChr(39)&' ')

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT t0.DocDate as 'Tanggal Posting', t0.DocNum as 'No.Dokumen', t0.CardCode as 'Kode Customer', t0.CardName as 'Nama Customer', t1.ItemCode as 'Kode Barang', t1.Dscription as 'Nama Barang', t1.Quantity, t1.UoMCode as 'UoM Satuan', t1.U_IDU_QtyPack as 'Qty Pack', t1.U_IDU_UoMPack as 'UoM Pack', CASE WHEN t0.DocStatus = 'O' THEN 'Open' WHEN t0.DocStatus = 'C' THEN 'Close' ELSE 'Cancelled' END 'Status'
FROM ORDR t0
INNER JOIN RDR1 t1 on t0.DocEntry = t1.DocEntry

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToDNDataTable(0,'Tanggal Posting,No.Dokumen,Kode Customer,Nama Customer,Kode Barang,Nama Barang,Quantity,UoM Satuan,Qty Pack,UoM Pack,Status','@')
